announcement.title: Announcements
announcement.text: Our service will be down for two days(by 12:00 a.m. Pacific time on the 31st Oct.) for server maintenance and app updates. We apologize for the inconvenience.

announcement.title: App update notice
announcement.text:
### Please update your app  
[from the Google play store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.semaphore.aienglish)

announcement.title: App update notice
